Uses of Package
fr.sorbonne_u.components

  • Packages that use fr.sorbonne_u.components 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components
    Basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm
    Component virtual machines for both single computer and distributed deployments.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.forplugins
    Inbound port classes for plug-ins in the basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.controlflowhelpers
    Control flow helper classes for the basic component model.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc
    Dynamic remote component creation and connection for component assemblies.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.dcc.ports
    Ports for dynamic remote component creation and connection.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.connectors
    Connectors for reflection.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.interfaces
    Interfaces for reflection.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.reflection.ports
    Ports for reflection.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components used by fr.sorbonne_u.components 
    Class and Description
    AbstractComponent
    The class AbstractComponent represents the basic information and methods for components in the component model, completing the component virtual machine with operations dealing with individual components.
    ComponentI
    The interface ComponentI serves as common supertype for all classes that implements components in this component model.
    ComponentI.ComponentService
    The interface ComponentService is meant to group under a same interface all of the requests that return results for this component.
    ComponentI.ComponentTask
    The interface ComponentTask is meant to group under a same interface all of the tasks for this component.
    ComponentState
    The enumeration ComponentState describes the different states in which a component can be during its life-cycle.
    ComponentStateI
    The interface ComponentStateI represents the common supertype of all states in components life-cycles.
    PluginI
    The interface PluginI defines the basic implementation services of component plug-ins seen as objects.
  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.cvm 
    Class and Description
    ComponentI
    The interface ComponentI serves as common supertype for all classes that implements components in this component model.

  • Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components used by fr.sorbonne_u.components.pre.controlflowhelpers 
    Class and Description
    AbstractComponent.AbstractTask
    The abstract class AbstractTask provides the basic method implementations for component tasks.
    ComponentI
    The interface ComponentI serves as common supertype for all classes that implements components in this component model.
    ComponentI.ComponentTask
    The interface ComponentTask is meant to group under a same interface all of the tasks for this component.
